Vettori to Hussey, FOUR runs drops it really short and cuts back on the pace, Clarke waits on it, gets in position to thwack it past extra cover, the power in the shot was enormous given the pace at which the ball was delivered
Vettori to Hussey, no run gets behind the line and defends
O'Brien to Clarke, no run pushes it towards mid-on and the non-striker's sent back

O'Brien to Hussey, no run keeps it a fraction short and he steers it to the off side
O'Brien to Hussey, no run stays back at the crease, turns the face of the bat slightly and defends
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run steers it towards gully
Vettori to Hussey, no run gets to the pitch of the ball and drives to mid-off
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run gets forward and drives back to the bowler
Vettori to Clarke, no run gets forward to drive and gets a thin inside edge on to his pads and Vettori appeals, good decision by Bucknor
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run gets back and punches it to the off side
Vettori to Hussey, no run
Vettori to Hussey, no run
O'Brien to Clarke, no run lands it on a good length on the off stump and he gets a half stride forward before pushing it to the off side
O'Brien to Clarke, no run a fraction fuller and he pushes it to the off side as well
O'Brien to Clarke, FOUR runs he overpitches on middle and off, Clarke times the forward drive very crisply and the ball beats the bowler in a flash and mid-on who dives in vain
O'Brien to Clarke, no run steers a good length ball to the off side
O'Brien to Clarke, no run clips it very firmly towards mid-on, that looked like four the moment it left the bat
O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run turns the face of the bat to clip it away to the on side but he fails to beat mid-on
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run slow through the air on the off stump and he defends
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run full on middle and off and driven to mid-off
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run chips down the track and works it against the turn to long-on
Vettori to Hussey, no run turns just a bit, he checks his shot and defends
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run flighted on middle and off and worked against the turn to the on side
Vettori to Clarke, no run flighted on middle and off and he checks his shot again and taps it safely
O'Brien to Hussey, no run gets width outside off and he cuts hard but the fielder at backward point does well to fall ton his right and cut it off
O'Brien to Hussey, no run full on the offstump and driven very firmly to short cover
O'Brien to Hussey, 2 runs gets forward and taps it wide of short cover this time
O'Brien to Hussey, no run a little slower, Hussey continues to prod forward and target the gap at cover

O'Brien to Hussey, OUT direct hit and David Hussey's got to go! He pushes a good length ball in front of mid-off and takes a chance with a sharp single to Vettori, unfortunately he taps it to Vettori's left and that enables him to gather the ball quickly and fire it on the stumps with his throwing arm
O'Brien to Clarke, no run slower ball on the offstump, he defends to the off side

Vettori to Hussey, FOUR runs comes over the wicket to the left-hander, he overpitches outside the offstump and a mere defensive push on the front foot is enough to beat mid-off, nice way to get off the mark
Vettori to Hussey, no run lands outside off and he defends to the off side
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run sprays it on the pads, he clips it with the turn to square leg
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run drops it a fraction short on the offstump, he rocks back, waits for the turn and cuts
Vettori to Hussey, no run thrusts his pad forward and shoulders arms
Vettori to Hussey, no run quicker through the air, he gets forward early and defends
O'Brien to Clarke, no run full on the offstump, he gets behind the line and drives to the off side
O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run commits to the front foot and pushes it wide of cover and sets off
O'Brien to Hussey, no run Hussey's solid on the forward defense, he's looking quite comfortable at the crease
O'Brien to Hussey, 2 runs strays on the pads and he clips it just wide of McCullum
O'Brien to Hussey, no run gets forward and defends back to the bowler on the walk
O'Brien to Hussey, no run lands it outside off and Hussey opts to let that one go

Vettori to Hussey, no run flighted on middle and leg and he defends the quicker delivery
Vettori to Hussey, no run flighted on the offstump, he defends again

Patel to Clarke, no run no slip in place, the ball turns in slightly, he defends forward
Patel to Clarke, no run slower through the air, he gets forward early and defends
Patel to Clarke, no run shapes to defend but the bat turns a bit while making contact with the ball
Patel to Clarke, FOUR runs poor delivery, he strays down the legside and he clips it with the turn down to fine leg, the fielder is square
Patel to Clarke, no run pitches this on middle and off, he defends forward
Patel to Clarke, no run drops it slightly shorter in length, he rocks back, makes room and cuts but fails to beat gully
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run commits early to the drive and pushes it with the turn to long-on

Vettori to Clarke, no run gets forward and defends
Vettori to Clarke, no run drives firmly but straight to Hussey, Hussey owes Clarke a single sometime, if not a beer

Patel to Clarke, 1 run gets to the pitch of the ball and works it past the bowler
Patel to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey goes over the top, he stays at the crease, gets under a flighted delivery and slogs him over midwicket, one bounce and four
Patel to Hussey, no run gets well forward and defends
Patel to Hussey, no run commits to the front foot and defends to the off side
Patel to Hussey, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, he clips it against the turn to the on side

Southee to Clarke, FOUR runs too straight this time and Clarke capitalises, he moves across and flicks the ball off the pads towards the fine leg boundary, Southee holds his head in dismay, he knows that was a poor ball
Southee to Clarke, 1 run played down to third man for a single
Southee to Hussey, no run good length and line from Southee, wicket to wicket this time, Hussey defends on the front foot

Mills to Hussey, 1 run Hussey tries to club it away but he fails to pick the slower one this time, the ball hits his body and stops in front of the stumps, Clarke sets off for the run and Hussey complies

O'Brien to White, 1 run bowls a fairly high away swinging full toss and he taps it away to the covers

O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run that's a toe crusher, and ouch that hurts! He takes a single to midwicket and he calls for assistance, the physio comes out and Clarke's called for a bye runner, surely Iain O'Brien's going to blog about this tonight, well actually he decides against the bye runner
O'Brien to White, 1 run makes a lot of room and plays out an inswinging yorker to the on side

O'Brien to Clarke, OUT and Clarke misses out on a century! O'Brien bowls an inswinging yorker down the leg side, Clarke steps down the track and tries to clip it wide of midwicket, the ball hits his pad and deflects on to the stumps
O'Brien to Ferguson, 2 wide he slides down the leg side but it's way too wide and he can
O'Brien to White, 1 run gets underneath a full delivery and scoops it down to deep midwicket
O'Brien to Ferguson, 1 run full on middle and off and he turns the face of the bat and gets off the mark in international cricket with a clip to midwicket
Southee to Hussey, 2 runs slower on the pads and he works it away easily down to Fulton at deep square-leg
Southee to Hussey, 2 runs aims for the yorker outside off and he makes room and drives hard to long-on, the throw is flat and quick and Southee fails to deflect it back to the stumps

Southee to Hussey, no run taps it towards Taylor at short mid-off and sends his partner back, Taylor relays the throw to the bowler wide of the stumps but the batsman makes it home and collides with Taylor in the process and tumbles
Southee to Hussey, no run makes room to carve it away but he
Southee to Hussey, 1 run full on the offstump and pushed to long-off
Southee to Clarke, FOUR runs nice shot, Southee bowls the slower one and drops it too short, Clarke makes room and slaps it past extra cover, full marks for placement as the ball beats deep cover
O'Brien to Hussey, 1 run slower ball outside the off stump, he opens the face and steers it to the off side
O'Brien to Clarke, 2 runs nudges it to deep square leg and pushes the second run, Hussey is struggling a bit and dives at the crease, O Brien whips off the bails but Hussey's just home
O'Brien to Clarke, no run goes for a wild swing across the line and places it to midwicket
O'Brien to Clarke, 1 run chips down the track and places it to long-off

O'Brien to Hussey, 2 runs simply awesome work by Guptill! Hussey slogs O'Brien down to long-on, Guptill pedals backwards towards the boundary, takes the catch, the momentum pushes him towards the rope and he has the presence of mind to release the ball, he saved six runs there, legen - (wait for it) -
O'Brien to Hussey, OUT the slower ball consumes him this time, he goes for a wild flat batted slog but mistimes it completely, Vettori takes it easily at midwicket running backwards slightly
Mills to Ferguson, 1 run full on the off stump and driven to long-off
Mills to White, 1 wide slides wide down the leg side and he tries to flick it away with his pad
Mills to White, 1 run makes a lot of room and digs out a low full toss to long-off
Mills to Ferguson, 1 run gets another yorker and he digs it out to the off side again
Mills to White, 1 run tries to get under a yorker but he has to settle for another single to long-off
Mills to Ferguson, 1 run bowls another slower one and Ferguson is firced to check his shot and clip it down to deep midwicket
Mills to White, 1 run angles a low full toss on middle and leg, he tucks it down to deep midwicket, just seven off that over, nice stuff from Mills
O'Brien to White, 2 runs bowls a slower ball around the off stump and he stays at the crease and scoops it towards long-off
O'Brien to White, 1 run bowls a low full toss on the pads and he clips it away down to deep square leg
O'Brien to Ferguson, 1 run full outside off and driven firmly through the line to long-off
O'Brien to White, 2 runs digs the slower ball much shorter, he swivels and pulls, the top edge is skied for a long time but it's too much for short fine leg to run back and take the catch
O'Brien to White, 1 run gets forward and pushes it to long-on
O'Brien to Ferguson, 1 run a high full toss hovering around the waist, he pushes it hard down to long-off

This is going to be an interesting chase. Let's see if McCullum can fire today. Taking you through the second half is Siddhartha Talya. Join us in around half an hour. Cheers for now! And by the way, there's the IPL auction to give you company...

So New Zealand are set a funny old target of 226.These middle of the road targets can sometimes be tricky. I don't think Australia will be too thrilled with this but at least it's an improvement from the previous game. Hussey and Clarke consolidated for a long period and looked to set a platform for a bigger
All set for the start here, Bracken to bowl to McCullum
The latest from the IPL auction is that Mashrafe Mortaza, the Bangladesh fast bowler, has been bought for a whopping $600,000 by Kolkata Knight Riders.

Australia made New Zealand work hard for what seemed like a paltry 181 in the first ODI, so getting 226 will not be all that easy. The visitors will hope for a better display from their top order, particularly McCullum, who hasn't scored a fifty in nine innings.
Welcome back to the run chase. Kanishkaa has returned to his desk, and it's Siddhartha Talya taking over.
Bracken to McCullum, no run good length on middle and leg, defended off the front foot back to the bowler
Bracken to McCullum, no run short of a length on middle and off, defended watchfully on the off side
Bracken to McCullum, 1 leg bye straying on the pads, he tries to turn it down fine, gets a leg bye as it clips his pads
Bracken to Guptill, no run short of a length outside off, waits for it and opens the face to guide it to point
Bracken to Guptill, no run short of a good length on middle and leg, defended towards midwicket
Bracken to Guptill, no run short of a good length on the off stump, defended on the front foot to cover
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, 1 run shaping away from the right hander, bowled on a good length outside off, McCullum opens the face to guide it to third man
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run good movement away from the batsman, fuller outside off, Guptill lets it go
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run bang on target, a testing line just marginally outside off, there's some late movement away as well, defended solidly on the off side
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run held it back a touch this time, in the channel outside off, left alone

Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run beaten! Short of a good length outside off, hitting the pitch hard and then swinging away, Guptill prods at it away from his body, is done in by the movement and the extra bounce
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run much straighter and plays it well this time, gets forward and defends it confidently towards mid-off
Bracken to McCullum, no run pitched outside leg and struck him on the pads as he tried to work it away fine
Bracken to McCullum, 1 wide down the leg side, McCullum fails to glance it down fine, given a wide anyway
Bracken to McCullum, no run full on middle and moving into the right hander, driven firmly to mid-on
Bracken to McCullum, no run almost! Short of a length on the off, spat off the pitch but McCullum played it with soft hands, it took the outside edge and fell short of a diving Cameron White at slip
Bracken to McCullum, 2 runs short on middle and leg, pushed away into the leg side towards square leg for a couple
Bracken to McCullum, 2 runs full on the pads, shuffles just a touch and flicks it away wide of short fine for two more
Bracken to McCullum, no run good length on middle and leg, pushed off the front foot to mid-on
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, no run fielded well off his own bowling, driven firmly back to him, he sticks out his left hand to prevent a couple of runs
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, 1 run dropped short of cover for a quick single
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, FOUR runs full outside off, and in the zone for McCullum, he makes a bit of room and carts it over the covers for a boundary
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, 2 wide misdirected slower ball bowled short outside leg stump, he tries to help it on its way to the fine-leg boundary, misses, but it's given a wide

Hilfenhaus to Guptill, FOUR runs dropped, short and wide, Guptill cuts it away powerfully over Clarke at point, the ball clips Michale Clarke's fingers on its way to the boundary. He was slow to react there, perhaps still recovering from the sore toe
Hilfenhaus to Guptill, 3 runs shot! Fractionally short outside off and Guptill eases that through the covers off the back foot fot three runs

Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run almost chopped it on, short of a length on the off stump, not enough room there to cut, he tries to do just that, gets an inside edge that doesn't miss the off stump by much
Bracken to Guptill, no run beaten! Short of a good length outside off, anging away with the angle, he tries to defend it off the back foot, misses
Bracken to Fulton, 2 runs full on middle and leg, driven wide of midwicket off the front foot for a couple
Bracken to Fulton, no run held its line this time, good length outside off, he gets outside the line to defend it back to the bowler
Bracken to Fulton, no run pitched outside leg and moved into Fulton who tried to work that away on the leg side, got an inside edge onto his pads
Bracken to Fulton, no run a good testing line outside off stump, going away with the angle, Fulton shoulders arms to that one
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run short on middle and leg, turned away off his hips towards square leg

Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run short on middle, McCullum senses a chance and goes for a mighty pull over square leg, the ball brushes his trousers on the way to the keeper. Haddin goes up, so does the bowler, but the umpire Paul Reiffel is unmoved
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run short of a length on middle and leg, played away to square leg
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run bouncer banged in short on middle, McCullum ducks under it, one for the over
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run short of a good length on leg stump, tries to turn it away fine, is struck on the thighs
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, no run similar ball, similar result, the ball drops on the leg side, they decide against the single
Bracken to Fulton, 1 run good length outside off, pushed firmly off the front foot wide of mid-off for a single
Bracken to McCullum, 1 run full outside off, opens the face to run it down to third man
Bracken to Fulton, no run pitching on a good length on middle and off, defended off the front foot to the bowler
Bracken to Fulton, no run fuller on the off stump, lunges forward to push it to cover
Bracken to Fulton, no run short of a length on the off stump, defended off the back foot to cover
Bracken to Fulton, no run good length outside off, left alone to the keeper
Hilfenhaus to McCullum, 3 runs straying in line this time, its full on the pads, flicked away through square leg for three runs
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, no run on a good length on middle and leg, driven off the front foot to mid-on
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, 2 runs pushed off the front foot wide of a diving cover, Clarke gives chase but returns a rather wayward throw to the non-strikers end, the batsmen run an easy two
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, no run ouch! Short on middle, Fulton attempts to duck, it hits him on his back, but he's fine, no show of pain there

Hilfenhaus to Fulton, no run missed run out, short of a length on middle, turned away to midwicket and McCullum is halfway down the pitch, the fielder takes aim but misses the stumps at the non-strikers end by a whisker. McCullum was miles outside the crease
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, no run on middle and leg, played away to square leg
Bracken to McCullum, no run back of a length on the off stump, struck firmly to cover
Bracken to McCullum, no run he needs to bowl much fuller here it's short again outside the off stump, guided to point off the back foot
Bracken to McCullum, no run cramped him for room there, opens the face to play it to point once again
Bracken to McCullum, FOUR runs shot! Good length outside off, edges it deliberately just at the last moment wide of a diving third man for a boundary
Bracken to McCullum, no run in the channel outside off, defended into the off side
Bracken to McCullum, no run beaten this time, angling away from the right hander after it's bowled wide the crease, McCullum walks across and tries to run it down to third man, fails to make contact
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, FOUR runs poor ball and gets the treatment, full on middle and leg, Fulton gets under it and flicks it away over midwicket
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, no run held it back, its short of a length on the off stump, defended off the back foot towards cover
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, no run punched off the back foot towards point, bowled on a good length this time
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, FOUR runs begging to be hit there, banged in short on middle, its a rank long hop and Fulton rocks onto the back foot to pull it away over square leg
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, no run short of a good length on middle, defended back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Fulton, no run tries to cut it away towards point this time, gets a thick inside edge towards midwicket instead

Johnson to McCullum, 2 runs Almost produces a wicket, slower ball bowled full outside off, McCullum chases it, ends up slicing it really high but in a safe zone between third man and deep cover, failed to pick the slower one there
Johnson to McCullum, no run zipped away off the pitch, short of a good length outside off and cut away as McCullum tried to defend it off the back foot
Johnson to McCullum, no run short of a length on middle and off, guided off the back foot to point
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run full outside off, driven firmly but straight to mid-off, who's on the circle, and they manage to sneak a single
Johnson to Fulton, 1 run short on middle and leg, turned away off the back foot wide of square leg for a single
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run pushed through the covers off the back foot for a single
Clarke to McCullum, no run tossed up on middle and off, driven back to the bowler
Clarke to McCullum, 1 run drifting into the batsman, tries to drive it back past Clarke, gets an inside edge towards short fine
Clarke to Fulton, 1 run full on middle and leg, driven to mid-on for a single
Clarke to McCullum, no run flighted on middle and leg, angling into the batsman from round the wicket, gets forward and defends
Clarke to McCullum, no run full on the pads, angling down leg, tries to work it away, is hit on the pads
Clarke to McCullum, 1 run shorter on middle and leg, flicked away wide of square leg for a single
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, square driven to deep cover for a single
Johnson to Fulton, no run on middle and leg, pushed off the front foot to mid-on
Johnson to Fulton, no run short of a good length outside off, goes for it, its a touch too wide, but he fails to reach
Johnson to Fulton, 1 run gets forward and pushes it firmly wide of mid-off for a single
Johnson to McCullum, no run short of a good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot to the bowler
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run pushed off the back foot to deep cover for an easy single
Clarke to McCullum, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
Clarke to Fulton, no run flighted on middle, tries to driven it to long-off, gets an inside edge onto his pads
Clarke to Fulton, 1 run flighted on leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on
Clarke to McCullum, no run turned away straight to square leg, just a fraction short on leg stump
Clarke to McCullum, 2 runs flighted on middle, driven firmly back past the bowler, its racing to the long-on boundary but Mitchell Johnson pulls off an excellent save to keep the batsmen to two
Clarke to McCullum, no run struck to cover off the back foot
Johnson to Fulton, no run short of a good length outside off, struck firmly to cover
Johnson to Fulton, FOUR runs overpitched outside off and gets the treatment, driven crisply off the front foot wide of mid-off all the way to the boundary. Easily done
Johnson to Fulton, no run similar delivery, but not as full, attempts an identical shot but is beaten by the late away movement
Johnson to Fulton, no run short of a good length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
Johnson to Fulton, no run much straighter this time, played away into the leg side
Johnson to Fulton, no run short on the off stump, presents the full face to defend to cover
Hopes to McCullum, no run good length on middle and leg, defended off the front foot towards midwicket
Hopes to McCullum, no run short of a length outside off, goes for a cut, but there's hardly any foot movement there, misses. Perhaps it didn't bounce as much as he expected
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run turned away off the front foot wide of midwicket
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run short outside off, cut away fiercely towards third man
Hopes to McCullum, no run slower ball bowled full outside off, driven firmly off the front foot towards extra cover
Johnson to Taylor, no run a touch too wide outside off, held its line, left alone by Taylor

Johnson to Taylor, no run good ball, full on middle and off, it seemed as if Taylor was initially playing inside the line to that one, managed to get his bat down in time and defend it towards mid-off
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run full on the off stump and swinging into the right hander, driven firmly to deep cover
Johnson to McCullum, no run slower ball bowled on a good length on the off stump, defended watchfully towards extra cover
Johnson to McCullum, no run in the corridor outside off, swinging away after pitching, left alone to the keeper
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run short of a good length on the off stump, dropped on the off side and they set off for a quick single
Hopes to McCullum, no run a probing line outside off stump, McCullum has been quite sedate today, left alone to the keeper
Hopes to McCullum, no run an attempted bouncer outside off, but the pitch is really slow, took a while to reach the keeper who took it on his knees
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run pushed wide of cover and they steal a quick single
Hopes to Taylor, no run good length outside off and some inward movement on its way to the keeper
Hopes to Taylor, no run fuller on middle and leg, defended off the front foot to mid-on
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run good length outside off, driven firmly but straight to deep cover
Johnson to Taylor, no run full outside off and angling away from the right hander, left alone
Johnson to Taylor, no run short of a good length outside off, left alone yet again
Johnson to Taylor, no run tries to push it away on the leg side, gets a thick outside edge off a good length ball on the off as it rolls towards Clarke at point
Johnson to Taylor, no run slower ball bowled full on the off stump and angling away, drew Taylor forward and deceives him completely as he tries to defend it towards cover

Johnson to Taylor, 3 runs poor fielding, pushed to midwicket off the back foot, David Hussey needlessly attempts a direct hit at the non-striker's end, it's wayward and concedes two more on overthrows
Johnson to McCullum, FOUR runs full outside off stump, driven back firmly past the bowler to evade a diving mid-off for a boundary
Hopes to Taylor, no run rank long hop outside off, missed opportunity, pulled away straight to midwicket
Hopes to Taylor, no run full outside off stump, driven well on the front foot to mid-off
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run kept a touch low but played well in the end, short of a good length outside off, pushed off the front foot towards deep cover for a single
Hopes to McCullum, no run good length on the off stump, defended to extra cover
Hopes to McCullum, no run banged in short outside off, McCullum backs away from it after giving the bowler the charge even before the ball is delivered
Hopes to McCullum, no run fuller on the off stump, driven crisply but straight to mid-off
Johnson to Taylor, no run short of a good length outside off and moving away with the angle, left alone
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run struck on the pads as he tries to turn it away towards square leg, they scramble a run
Johnson to McCullum, 2 runs full on middle and leg, driven wide of midwicket off the front foot for a couple
Johnson to McCullum, no run full outside off and swinging away just a touch, caught him walking as he attempted a drive
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run short of a length outside off, edged away towards third man, that wasn't entirely deliberate, was probably trying to guide it towards point
Johnson to Taylor, no run full outside off and square driven powerfully to Clarke at point who does well to get his hands to it, would have gone for a four otherwise
Hopes to McCullum, no run on middle and off, defended off the front foot to cover
Hopes to McCullum, no run much fuller this time, presents the full face to drive it to cover
Hopes to McCullum, no run defended watchfully this time, it's slightly overpitched by McCullum's taking no chances here
Hopes to McCullum, 4 leg byes straying on the pads and pays the price, he tries to glance it down fine, but it brushes his pads on the way to the fine-leg boundary
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run full on the pads, pushed to mid-on for a single
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run short outside off, pulled all along the ground towards deep midwicket for a single
Clarke to Taylor, 2 runs full outside off, driven firmly wide of deep cover for a couple
Clarke to Taylor, no run tossed up on middle and off, pushed off the front foot wide of midwicket
Clarke to Taylor, no run turned away to square leg this time, maintaining a stump-to-stump line
Clarke to Taylor, no run drifting into the pads, tries to play it fine, is struck high on the pads
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run whipped away off the back foot wide of square leg for a single
Clarke to McCullum, no run slightly short outside off, cut away to point
Hopes to Taylor, no run short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
Hopes to Taylor, no run opens the face to guide it to point
Hopes to Taylor, no run full outside off, driven firmly, but straight to extra cover
Hopes to Taylor, no run good over so far, dropped off the back foot into the off side, looks for a single, but is sent back
Hopes to Taylor, no run good length on middle and leg, pushed off the front foot to mid-on
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run finally a run, but an excellent over nevertheless, chopped down wide of cover for a quick single
Clarke to Taylor, no run slightly short on leg stump, turned away to square leg
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run tossed up on leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on
Clarke to McCullum, 2 wide Hahaa, Haddin takes off the bails with his gloves again, its fired down the leg side and his gloves flick the bails as he tries to collect
Clarke to Taylor, no run short of a length on middle, pushed off the front foot to midwicket
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, tries to drive it down the ground, gets an inside edge down to fine leg
Clarke to McCullum, no run pushed off the back foot into the off side
Clarke to McCullum, no run cramped for room, tries to cut, is only able to chop it down towards point
Hopes to Taylor, 2 runs full on middle and leg, chipped over midwicket for a couple, he's trying to get a move-on now
Hopes to Taylor, no run short of a good length outside off and some late away movement, Taylor tries o cut that past point but it's a touch too quick for him
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run full on the pads, driven to long-on
Hopes to McCullum, no run short of a length outside off, misses out on a pull, ends up mistiming it to midwicket
Hopes to McCullum, no run much fuller on the off stump, defended solidly on the off side
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run short on middle and leg,walks across and helps it on its way to fine leg
Clarke to McCullum, 2 runs on middle and off, paddled away really fine wide of Hilfenhaus in the deep for a couple
Clarke to McCullum, no run tossed up on middle and off, defended off the front foot back to the bowler
Clarke to McCullum, 1 run makes room and drives that down the ground to long-on, didn
Clarke to Taylor, no run short on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot to mid-on
Clarke to Taylor, no run pushed in quicker on middle and off, defended on the off side

Clarke to Taylor, FOUR runs errs in length ever so slightly and pays the price, that was coming, flighted outside off and lands really full, Taylor stays his ground and lofts it between long-off and deep cover for a pressure-relieving boundary
Hopes to Elliott, no run short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot towards point
Hopes to Elliott, no run and again, is nicely behind it, and opens the face to play it to point
Hopes to Elliott, no run swinging in this time, good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot on the leg side
Hopes to Elliott, no run a touch fuller there, tries to play an off drive, gets a thick inside edge to mid-on
Hopes to Elliott, no run bouncer banged in short on middle, Elliot has nothing to do with it
White to Taylor, 2 runs tossed up outside leg stump, turns it away wide of fine leg for a couple
White to Taylor, 1 run some spin there for White, good length on leg stump, pushed wide of midwicket for a single

White to Elliott, 2 runs flighted outside off, driven towards deep cover who has to run in a few paces to pick that up, by the time he's returned a throw to the non-striker's end, the batsmen have come back for the second
White to Elliott, 1 leg bye tossed up on middle, takes it on the full and paddles it down to fine leg
White to Taylor, no run lands full outside off, driven off the front foot to cover
White to Taylor, 1 run really slow through the air there, pushed towards square leg
Hopes to Taylor, 1 wide too wide outside off, lands full but the batsman rightly lets it go
Hopes to Taylor, no run short of a good length on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run short of a length outside off, chopped away to deep cover
Hopes to Elliott, 1 run fuller on the off stump, steered to third man
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run played away to cover off the front foot and sets off for a quick single, Taylor stretches to make it to the other end as Clarke fires in a throw
Hopes to Elliott, no run full on the off stump, driven off the front foot to mid-off
Hopes to Elliott, no run guided to point off the front foot, bowled on a good length outside off
White to Taylor, 1 run tossed up outside off, lands full, driven all along the ground to long-off

White to Elliott, 2 runs flighted outside off, driven firmly to cover where a fumble allows them to come back for the second, Taylor again in the firing line as a throw from Bracken to the non-strikers end almost had him struggling
White to Elliott, 1 run pushed off the back foot towards square leg
White to Taylor, 1 run on middle and leg, worked away to fine leg
White to Elliott, 2 runs shot! Filghted outside off and its overpitched, leans into the drive and places it between long-off and deep cover for a couple
White to Elliott, 1 leg bye good length outside leg stump, flicked away fine for a single
Johnson to Elliott, no run edged straight away, full on middle and off, tries to defend it back to the bowler, the ball lands well short of White, who's standing really wide, and really deep at slip
Johnson to Elliott, no run beaten this time, full outside off and he goes for the drive, fails to reach it
Johnson to Elliott, 1 wide full down the leg side, tries to glance it down fine, misses
Johnson to Elliott, no run almost yorker length outside off, dug out to cover
Johnson to Elliott, 1 run good length outside of stump, eased through the covers for a single
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run swinging into Ross Taylor after landing on a good length on the off stump, tries to play it on the leg side, gets a thick outside edge towards deep cover for a single
Johnson to Elliott, no run tries to open the face off the front foot to run it down to the third man, is beaten as the ball swings away after pitching
White to Taylor, 1 run flighted outside off, struck off the front foot to deep cover
White to Elliott, 1 run full toss outside off, the deep cover fielder is made busy again
White to Taylor, 1 run and again, low full toss that is driven into the vacant off side field
White to Elliott, 1 run tossed up outside off, paddled down towards square leg for a single
White to Taylor, no run on middle and leg, thrown up this time, pushed back to the bowler
White to Taylor, 1 run struck firmly to extra cover who dives but fails to prevent the single
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run full outside off, squeezed through to deep cover
Johnson to Elliott, no run short of a good length on middle and leg, defended off the back foot
Johnson to Elliott, no run good length outside off, he chases it, looks to square drive it towards point, missed it
Johnson to Elliott, 2 runs short of a length on middle and leg, turned away wide of square leg off the back foot for a single
Johnson to Elliott, no run short on middle, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
Johnson to Elliott, no run steered to point off the front foot, full outside off
Hussey to Taylor, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, flicked away wide of square leg for a single
Hussey to Elliott, no run flighted on middle and off, driven to midwicket
Hussey to Elliott, no run on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Hussey to Elliott, 1 run steps out and drives it down the ground to long-on
Hussey to Taylor, 1 run held it back a touch, pitched short of a good length on the off stump, turned to Warner at midwicket who concedes a single by way of a misfield
Hussey to Elliott, 1 run short on middle and leg, worked away off the back foot to deep square leg
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, no run short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot into the off side
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, FOUR runs poor ball, straying on the pads, on the leg stump and Elliot walks across to glance it down towards the fine-leg boundary
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, no run good length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, 1 run short on middle and off, closes the face to turn it wide of square leg
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run slower offcutter outside off stump, bowled at 123 kmph, left alone to the keeper
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run defended off the front foot to short cover
Hussey to Elliott, 1 run flighted outside off, driven off the front foot to long-off

Hussey to Taylor, FOUR runs dropped, tossed up on middle and leg, comes down the track and lofts it high towards deep midwicket, Michale Hussey runs well to his left and slides but fails to hold on, and deflects the ball to the boundary
Hussey to Taylor, no run pushed through quicker, defended on the off side
Hussey to Taylor, 5 wide poor bowling, the frustratio probably getting to him there, fired in on the leg side, it's too wide and Haddin had absolutely to pluck that
Hussey to Taylor, no run short on the off stump, cut away to point
Hussey to Taylor, no run flighted on middle and leg, turned away to midwicket
Hussey to Taylor, no run on the off stump, pushed into the off side

Hilfenhaus to Elliott, no run short of a good length o the off stump, pushed to cover
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, no run banged in short on middle, tries to pull it away towards square leg, is struck on the thighs

Hilfenhaus to Elliott, FOUR runs deliberately played, short outside off, he cuts it away uppishly wide of slip to the boundary at the third man, Hilfenhaus has struggled today
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, no run short of a good length on the off stump, opens the face to defend it to point off the front foot
Bracken to Taylor, no run short of a good length outside off, defended off the back foot towards mid-off
Bracken to Taylor, FOUR runs shot! Fractionally short outside off, Taylor makes room and slashes it away wide of Clarke at point for a boundary
Bracken to Taylor, no run on the stumps this time, good length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
Bracken to Taylor, 1 leg bye pitched full outside leg and swung into the right hander, struck him on the pads as he tried to flick it away towards square leg
Bracken to Elliott, no run slower ball that Elliot failed to pick, pitched short on the off stump, he made room to guide that to third man, missed it completely
Bracken to Elliott, 1 run short of a good length outside off, steered to third man for a single
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, 1 run on the off stump, dropped short of cover and they steal a quick single
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run short of a length on middle and leg, defended towards midwicket
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, 1 run good length on middle and leg, tries to defend it off the back foot, gets a thick inside edge wide of square leg for a single
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, 1 run easily done, moves across and just closes the face to drop it on the leg side for a quick single
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run attempted bouncer, short outside off, Taylor lets it go
Hilfenhaus to Taylor, no run good delivery, right on target, bowled on a good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot to the bowler
Bracken to Elliott, no run short outside off, makes room and guides it straight to point
Bracken to Elliott, no run slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, bowled at 111.6 kmph, steered to point once again
Bracken to Elliott, 1 run punched off the back foot wide of mid-off for a single
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run good length on the off stump, pushed off the front foot to a slightly deepish mid-off for a quick single
Bracken to Elliott, no run slower ball bowled on a good length on middle and off, makes room and runs it straight to point
Bracken to Elliott, 1 run short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot wide of cover for a single
Johnson to Elliott, 2 runs short of a good length outside off, guided down to third man for a single
Johnson to Elliott, 1 run full outside off, driven firmly through the off side but deep cover runs in to keep the batsmen to a single

Johnson to Taylor, OUT momentary loss in concentration and Taylor pays the price!! Short outside off and he slashes at it blindly, played away from his body, gets a thin edge and Haddin makes no mistake. There was no need for that shot, and it's cost him his wicket.
Johnson to Broom, no run full outside off, he's taking no risks here, left alone to the keeper
Johnson to Broom, no run good length outside off stump, angling away from the right hander, left alone to the keeper
Johnson to Broom, no run bowled fuller outside off, defended off the front foot towards point
Bracken to Elliott, no run shot and well fielded, short of a good length outside off, cut away powerfully to point where Clarke stays alert as ever
Bracken to Elliott, 1 run full on the off stump, mid-off is right at the edge of the circle so the batsmen easily manage a single
Bracken to Broom, 1 run slower ball bowled full on middle and off, pushes at it off the front foot, gets a thick edge towards third man as the ball cuts away
Bracken to Elliott, 1 run slower ball bowled short outside off, he picked it to heave it towards deep midwicket
Bracken to Broom, no run zipped off the pitch this time, landed on a good length on middle and swung in, Elliot failed to bring his bat down in time and it went just over the stumps to Haddin
Bracken to Broom, FOUR runs important boundary, marginally short outside off, comes down the track and slices it away past point
Johnson to Elliott, FOUR runs poor ball this time, its overpitched this time, makes room and steers it wide of Clarke and point for another four
Johnson to Elliott, no run slower ball, played to point again but just a push this time
Johnson to Elliott, 1 run short on middle and leg, pulled away down to fine leg
Johnson to Broom, no run makes room to attempt a simliar shot but it's a touch too wide and he fails to reach
Johnson to Broom, FOUR runs full on middle, stands his ground at swings it away over Ferguson at midwicket for a boundary. Just managed to evade him there
Johnson to Broom, no run full on middle and off, driven to him again, but for no run
Bracken to Elliott, 1 run slower ball bowled on a good length outside off, dropped short of point for a quick single
Bracken to Broom, 1 run slower ball again, he made room there and Bracken spotted him, bowled it outside leg stump, pushed to cover for another single
Bracken to Elliott, no run slower offcutter, on a good length on the off, driven straight to short cover

Bracken to Elliott, FOUR runs and again, almost had him lbw there but that was brilliantly played in the end, slower one landing on middle, he shuffled across and glanced it well wide of short fine for a boundary
Bracken to Elliott, no run makes room and force it through the off side, the ball doesn't come onto fast enough, he checks his shot and plays it to cover
Bracken to Elliott, no run good length on middle and leg, pushed off the front foot to midwicket
Hopes to Broom, 1 run short of a length on middle, Broom mistimes a pull to mid-on but manages a quick single
Hopes to Elliott, 1 run fifty for Elliot, full outside off and squeezed through to third man. Excellent knock, played well with Taylor, and is now heading this partnership with Broom
Hopes to Broom, 1 run short on middle, tries to swing it away over midwicket, gets a faint inside edge short of Haddin and they get a single as he fumbles
Hopes to Elliott, no run pushed off the back foot to mid-on

Hopes to Elliott, 1 run missed opportunity there, slapped to mid-off where Hilfenhaus misfields, had he picked that up cleanly and hit the stumps, Elliot may well have been short at the non-striker's end
Hopes to Broom, 1 run short of a length on middle, pulled away towards deep midwicket for a single

Hilfenhaus to Broom, FOUR runs lucky but effective, short of a length on the off stump, he charges down the wicket to swat it over mid-on, got a thick outside edge that flew off the bat to the third-man boundary
Hilfenhaus to Broom, 1 run short on middle and leg, gets a single towards midwicket
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, 2 runs full on middle and leg, worked away between midwicket and square leg for a couple more
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, no run full on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, 1 run gets on the front foot and drives that to mid-on for a quick single
Hilfenhaus to Broom, no run full outside off, makes room and digs it out to short cover
Hopes to Elliott, 1 run short of a length outside off, comes down the track and cuts it away to deep point
Hopes to Broom, no run short on middle, misses out on a pull, is struck on the thighs

Hopes to Broom, 3 runs excellent fielding but they still get there, bowled full outside leg stump, he's already made some room, gets under it and drives it wide of Mitchell Johnson at mid-on, he gives his chase and dives full length to drag it back inside the ropes
Hopes to Elliott, no run bouncer banged in short on middle, Elliot ducks and thinks it deserves to be called a wide as its a touch too high, the umpires don't think so
Hopes to Elliott, 1 run short of a good length outside off, pushed wide of cover for a quick single
Hopes to Broom, FOUR runs Australia are on their way to being down 2-0 here, short on middle and off, he steps out and slogs that over mid-on for a boundary
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, 1 run full outside off, tries to drive through the line, gets an inside edge onto his pads and they take a quick single
Hilfenhaus to Broom, no run yorker on middle, well bowled, dug out back to the bowler
Hilfenhaus to Broom, 1 run low full toss on middle, he tries to drag it away wide of square leg but James Hopes fields well there to keep the batsmen down to a single
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, no run bouncer on middle, goes for the pull, misses
Hilfenhaus to Elliott, FOUR runs That's it, all over! Short on middle and thats dismissed to the deep square-leg boundary

I know its Broom and not Warner. Sorry for the typo there, and thanks for pointing it out. Anyway, its been an exciting match and hopefully the next one in Sydney, on February 8, will be just as good. Australia have to win that to stay in the series. Until then, it's goodbye from all of us here at Cricinfo.
Michael Clarke is the Man of the Match for his 98.

Australia have slid to their fifth consecutive defeat, that too at home. 226 was a competitive target on a slow pitch but New Zealand paced their innings brilliantly. They started patiently and McCullum was involved in two 40-plus partnerships with Fulton and Taylor to ensure his team didn;t lose early wicke
New Zealand won by 6 wickets (with 7 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Michael Clarke, AUS
